subject: Sailboats and Sailing
Surfing
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: Mr. Alter used a production line and polyurethane foam in surfboard manufacturing, then created the popular Hobie Cat sailboat in the late 1960s.
snippet: Mr. Alter used a production line and polyurethane foam in surfboard manufacturing, then created the popular Hobie Cat sailboat in the late 1960s.
